title: omg what have I done.....
body:
My brother mentioned me about the movie " Annabelle" ( you can watch it online just type " Annabelle Online " ) and right in the middle of the movie I noticed i'm watching it at 1AM.... and then in the end I found out it's based on a true event.... and then I remembered that the doll does exist and that doll is contained in a wooden glass closet (you can youtube Annabelle Museum and see for yourself)... FML IM PARANOID YET IDGAF. 

Also the movie sucked, waste of time.... but still... I'm freaked.
